timeline.bodyText: For security reason, we should allow injecting the truststore file name and the password here. Thus internally we can use a different file, and a different (ideally encrypted) password.
timeline.author: tbak

replies.bodyText: We should reference the attached truststure in this repo for running the integration tests only.
